Subjects: sermons, verse in; heaven, joys of
_description: On the bliss of heaven, interspersed with Latin in a Latin prose sermon — two couplets

CamJes13.First Lines:
Þat we sulde be blisseþat fer we schulde be
                    lisse…
CamJes13.Last Lines:
…þat lolych sulde be louelyþat wrecches sul be
                    vnorþi
